display_name: Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions: Single item Behavior
description:
The subscale score is based on 1 item from the Child Health Questionnaire Parent Form 50 Questions. [Asmussen L et al., 2000 (PubMed ID: 11029320)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/11029320/)

[Search for all CHQ-PF50 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/cfs/variables?search=chqpf50)
